"If you click on a field in the “Try a field” mode then:
" "- If you hit a mine, the game ends.
" "- If you do not hit a mine, a number appears on that field indicating how many mines are nearby.

" "If you click on a field in the “Place a flag” mode then:
" "- If you flag a field but there is no mine, the game ends.
" "- If you flag a field and there are no more mines, the game ends and you win!
